document.full_text: "we are all happy when nato bombs like that," the taxi driver said on wednesday, the morning after the heaviest western air strikes on the libyan capital.
document.title: anticipation in tripoli as net tightens on gaddafi
lines_and_colors: "we are all happy when nato bombs like that," the taxi driver said on wednesday, the morning after the heaviest western air strikes on the libyan capital.
